favourite.article: Lord my love for You increases Everyday. Lord I just love You ^_^

My dear Lord Jesus, my Bridegroom, forever I will love You!
Keep this love burning until You come my Lord Jesus....
It was so precious to say, “I do not count my own life as if precious to myself.” There is something more precious, more valuable, than my own life with everything related to it...
Lord I give my whole heart to You. All I want is to enjoy You to the uttermost. Lord I love You. You are my everything.

Lord I give my heart to You. Lord filled me with Your presence and let it flow to my outer being. I want to give my first love to You. All I want is to enjoy Your words and Your plan. Thank You for saving me. Lord, I know I am a sinner but still You gave Your life to save me and all of us. Oh Lord Jesus Christ I LOVE YOU. And I PRAISE YOU LORD JESUS!!!
Oh LORD JESUS I really love YOU! Lord I give my entire being, my whole heart to YOU and to YOUR DIVINE ECONOMY!
Lord, preserve our heart to love You more and more. We need You, Lord. Strengthen us into our inner man to become Your testimony on the earth.
Lord Jesus, I still love You! Much more today than yesterday.
I really enjoy this song: God, Lord Jesus, You need my heart; I give away the keys of mine!! I love You, Jesus!!! You're everything we need!!!
"It's good to hear how great God is to His words and promises. Run each race with faith and boldness to HIM alone."
O my Lord,I worship You forever more. Lord,I shall love others, just as You love us.
Lord Jesus I really love You.
Lord, I offer myself to You. It is an opportunity to serve and to love You. Lord, I offer my being wholly to You and I will give You all that I have.

O the joy of loving Him! Our life should be a life of joy, since there is joy - a great joy of loving Him no matter what our circumstances are, how difficult to go on, how limited we are, and how unclear we feel. Let's rejoice and rejoice evermore.
It's good to see that it's difficult to enjoy Him or have His presence without offering our heart.
To love the Lord is to give ourselves to Him.
